content.question: According to the passage, what do the experienced people advise Pliny to do concerning the Egyptian man?

choices.label: To properly declare the man’s wealth
To verify the man’s Roman citizenship
To ensure the man is in fact a freedman
To obtain Alexandrian citizenship for the man

content.answer: To obtain Alexandrian citizenship for the man
